scripts.dev:cdn: npm run rmEnv && npm run cp:cdn && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.start:cdn: cross-env useCdn=true npm run rmEnv && npm run cp:cdn && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.pure:build: npm run rmEnv && vue-cli-service build && rimraf dist/example dist/assets/css dist/assets/js
scripts.build: npm run rmEnv && vue-cli-service build && rimraf dist/example dist/assets/css dist/assets/js
scripts.build:pure:cdn: npm run rmEnv && npm run cp:cdn && vue-cli-service build  && npm run cp && rimraf dist/example/ dist/assets/
scripts.build:cdn: npm run rmEnv && npm run cp:cdn && vue-cli-service build --report && npm run swagger && npm run cp
scripts.build:report: npm run rmEnv && npm run cp:cdn && npm run downCdn && npm run downIconfront &&  vue-cli-service build --report && npm run swagger && npm run cp
scripts.build:cdn:report: npm run rmEnv && npm run cp:cdn && cross-env useCdn=true && vue-cli-service build --report
scripts.clear:install: npm install -g rimraf && npm run clear && cnpm install
scripts.checkout:main: git checkout master && git  pull origin master && git checkout main &&  git pull origin main &&  rimraf .git && mkdir .git && cp -r github/* .git && if exist .git echo '.git'
scripts.use:github: rimraf .git/config && rimraf .git && mkdir .git && cp -r github/* .git && npm run remoteinfo && npm run copy:config  && git pull origin master &&  npm run changelog:zh && npm run changelog:en && git add . && git cz
scripts.use:github:main: rimraf .git/config && rimraf .git && mkdir .git && cp -r github/* .git && npm run remoteinfo && npm run copy:config  && git pull origin main &&  npm run changelog:zh && npm run changelog:en && git add . && git cz
scripts.use:gitbit: rimraf .git/config && rimraf .git && mkdir .git && cp -r gitbit/* .git && npm run remoteinfo && git pull origin master && npm run changelog:zh && npm run changelog:en  && git add . && git cz
scripts.set:github: npm run remoteinfo && git push origin master && rimraf github && mkdir github && cp -r .git/* github && if exist .git echo '.git'
scripts.push: npm run use:github && npm run set:github
scripts.set:github:main: npm run remoteinfo && git push origin main && rimraf .git && mkdir .git && cp -r gitbit .git && if exist .git echo '.git'
scripts.set:gitbit: npm run remoteinfo && git push origin master && rimraf gitbit && mkdir gitbit && cp -r gitbit gitbit && if exist gitbit echo 'gitbit'
scripts.copy:config: rimraf src/config/developer.config.js && cp src/config/developer.lock.js src/config/developer.config.js && echo 'copy config done'
scripts.dgiot:install: npm run global add rimraf && rimraf node_modules/.bin && rimraf node_modules/.cache && rimraf node_modules/.npm run-integrity  && rimraf node_modules && rimraf npm run.lock && npm run
